About Us

We are team of IIIT Hyderabad graduates with more than 10 years of experience, started CodeCrux Web Technologies(P) Ltd. in T-HUB, Hyderabad, India
CodeCrux Web Technologies(p) Ltd. is worldwide provider of full fledged spectrum of Creative Design, Web and Mobile app Development and API Services. We have successfully delivered many projects for clients across the globe - USA, UK and Europe, Australia, Germany, India e.t.c.

We use following technologies to develop application:
Ruby, Ruby on rails, Python, AngularJS, BackboneJS, HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, SCSS, Postgres, MongoDB, MySql, Redis, Heroku, Amazon Web Services, Mobile Development Native as well as hybrid using Ionic & React Native and many more.

Intrepid entrepreneurs

Though we're a small team, we work closely with our clients. It's why our relationships last many years, and give us so many referrals.

Deep computer science knowledge

With founders holding degrees in Computer Science and Engineering, we're passionate about algorithms, patterns, and agile leadership. Above all, we apply concepts that matter most to your project.

Experience across industries

We're professional programmers who've worked in challenging and dynamic industries.

Meet Our Team

We meet and get to know our clients. You tell us and we listen.

Co-Founder/Product Manager

Deepak is IIIT-H graduate who focused on location/GPS based mobile technologies. He comes to codecrux after working with Verizon and Crypsis. He spends his time as an amateur photographer trying to capture beauty of nature on camera.


Co-Founder/Developer

Dinesh is IIIT-H graduate & a lifelong technophile and open source devotee. Prior to codecrux he build a number of web apps and led development teams.


Co-Founder & Director

Shyam is software developer, He is passionate about building scalable, reliable and efficient Ruby on Rails web applications. Prior to codecrux he build a number of web apps and lead development teams.


Developer/UX-Designer

Vinay is IIIT-H graduate & passionated to development startup products, Before CodeCrux, He worked for Microsoft Rising through engineering to technical product management. Vinay worked with FactSet orchestrating internal PM tools and led recruitement team.


Get in touch with CodeCrux team

We would love to contribute our expertise and insights to your product.
Do you want to know more about our services, have any questions, or any suggestions/feedback?



  • We'll contact you within 24 hrs with pricing info and next steps
  • We currently do Ruby, Ruby on rails development, iOS, iPhone and iPad apps, and Android application development
  • Need us to sign an NDA? No problem, just let us know and we'll take it from there
  • Once we confirm that we're a good fit for your project, we can move into the 24-hour test project to give you an understanding of our skills and process
  • No obligation, when you're ready to grow, we're ready for you!
